entries.name: Ancient Heritage
entries: You know one cantrip from the Druid or Ranger spell lists.

entries.name: Tribal Shaping
entries: Depending on tribe, you may gain limited shapeshifting or animalistic traits. Choose a subrace for specifics.

entries.name: Natural Hunter
entries: You gain proficiency in one of: Stealth, Survival, or Athletics.

entries.name: Partial Wildshape
entries: You gain a natural weapon that deals 1d4 + your Strength modifier and advantage on one chosen sensory check once per short rest.

entries.name: Aquatic Adaptation
entries: You have a swim speed equal to your walking speed and can hold your breath for twice as long as normal.

entries.name: Tidal Magic
entries: You learn one aquatic-themed cantrip (work with DM) and have advantage on checks to navigate coastal or sea environments.

entries.name: Winged Legacy (Limited)
entries: You have a gliding trait: when falling you may reduce falling speed and move horizontally equal to the fall distance once per short rest. Specific flight is subject to DM approval.

entries.name: Aerial Familiarity
entries: You gain proficiency in Acrobatics and advantage on checks related to aerial navigation.
